## Properties

| Property | Attribute | Description                        | Type      | Default |
| -------- | --------- | ---------------------------------- | --------- | ------- |
| `active` | `active`  | Set to true to show the tab panel. | `boolean` | `false` |
| `name`   | `name`    | The tab panel's name.              | `string`  | `''`    |


## Slots

| Slot | Description              |
| ---- | ------------------------ |
|      | The tab panel's content. |
